Package com.irurueta.numerical.integration

Class RombergMidPointQuadratureMatrixIntegrator

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.numerical.integration.MatrixIntegrator
com.irurueta.numerical.integration.RombergMatrixIntegrator<MidPointMatrixQuadrature>
com.irurueta.numerical.integration.RombergMidPointQuadratureMatrixIntegrator
public class RombergMidPointQuadratureMatrixIntegrator extends RombergMatrixIntegrator<MidPointMatrixQuadrature>
Computes function integration by using Romberg's method and Mid-Point Quadrature. Mid-point algorithm is suitable for improper integrations.
